techmeme.title: Fireworks AI, which helps companies fine-tune and customize AI models, raised $52M led by Sequoia at a $552M valuation, taking its total funding to $77M (Paayal Zaveri/Bloomberg)

Silicon Valley Defense Group: the US federal government spent $22B on tech from the top 100 national security startups, a paltry sum and far below VC investment (Heather Somerville/Wall Street Journal)
IDC estimates that Apple will sell under 500K Vision Pro units in 2024, and the headset's international launch will offset a 75% QoQ drop in US sales in Q3 2024 (Vlad Savov/Bloomberg)
Sources: Xiaohongshu, China's fastest-growing social media platform, sold existing shares in recent weeks at a $17B valuation; DST took part in the round (Eleanor Olcott/Financial Times)
Paris-based Bioptimus releases H-optimus-0, an open source AI model trained on hundreds of millions of images to aid research and diagnoses of diseases (Michael Hennessey/Bloomberg)
